sentences.en: A change in the money supply brings a corresponding change in expenditure.
sentences.cn: 货币供应量的改变随即引起支出的相应改变。

sentences.en: Each half reaction responds to the interfacial potential at the corresponding electrode.
sentences.cn: 每个半反应都与相应电极上的界面电势差相呼应.

sentences.en: For intermediate doses, the corresponding slant distances can be estimated by interpolation.
sentences.cn: 对于中间的剂量, 可以用内插法把相应的斜距估计出来.

sentences.en: I've been corresponding with a young scientist at Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 我一直在同剑桥大学的一位年轻科学家通信.

sentences.en: If the note of D is sounded on a harp, all the corresponding D strings of other octaves will likewise resonate.
sentences.cn: 如果用竖琴演奏D音符，其他八度音阶所有相应的D弦都将发出共鸣。

sentences.en: It has name corresponding to the facts.
sentences.cn: 它有着与事实相符的名称.

sentences.en: It is the distance between atoms corresponding to zero potential energy.
sentences.cn: 这就是相应于势能为零时的原子间距.

sentences.en: March and April sales this year were up 8 per cent on the corresponding period in 1992.
sentences.cn: 与1992年同期相比，今年3月和4月的销售额增长了8%。

sentences.en: Sales are up 10% on the corresponding period last year.
sentences.cn: 销售额和去年同时期相比增加了10%。

sentences.en: The corresponding reaction of acetaldehyde is subject to general base catalysis.
sentences.cn: 乙醛相应的反应服从广义的碱催化.

sentences.en: The hall was reserved exclusively for resident or corresponding members.
sentences.cn: 大厅是专门为本地会员或着通讯会员准备的.

sentences.en: The principal directions corresponding to two distinct principal strains are orthogonal.
sentences.cn: 和两个不同的主胁变相对应的主方向是互相正交的.

sentences.en: The war and the corresponding fall in trade have had a devastating effect on the country.
sentences.cn: 战争以及由此所导致的贸易量下降对这个国家产生了致命的影响。

sentences.en: There is an increase in production of 20 % above that of the corresponding period of last year.
This observation is called the law of corresponding states.
sentences.cn: 此观测结果就叫做对比状态定律.

sentences.en: What we required you to do is corresponding to the contract.
sentences.cn: 我们要你做的事情符合合同规定.

words.tran_cn: 通讯记者；客户；通信者；代理商行
相当的，相应的；一致的；通信的

phrases.tran_cn: 代理行；往来银行；业务联系银行

trans.tran_en: caused by or connected with something you have already mentioned

trans.tran_cn: 符合，相当于，通信（ correspond的现在分词）
